Name: Crea Caf√©
Review Text: Cool cafe next to a theater, hosting creative activities and courses, lovely sitting on the outside next to the canal.

Name: Crea Caf√©
Review Text: Marvelous student café, extremely friendly staff and very relaxed music and atmosphere. Prices are VERY reasonable, perfect for a quick  bite with the optional drink!

Name: Crea Caf√©
Review Text: They have a really great location, food prices and often host interesting events, would recommend! Also have a piano in the bar.

Name: Crea Caf√©
Review Text: Lovely place, good cappuccino and kind staff.

Name: Crea Caf√©
Review Text: great snacks and drinks, v nice personell :))

Name: Crea Caf√©
Review Text:
Cheap drinks, nice lamp and very close to comedy show.
Tense atmosphere, strange layout, weird service.
Offered Club Mate as a replacement for Red Bull for a Jaeger Bomb, which is unacceptable.

Name: Crea Caf√©
Review Text: Great atmosphere, and great beers and snacks. The cheepest draft beer is 2,30 but if you're in the mood for IPA's or other "exotic" beers, they have plenty of these as well. However, prices are quite steep (5,00 for an alternative beer). …

Name: Crea Caf√©
Review Text: Best place for UvA students to hang out. Excellent coffee served.

Name: Crea Caf√©
Review Text: Local University of Amsterdam watering hole.  Ordered some pemgen (spicy meatballs) and a Serrano ham sandwich with two pints of Grolsch.  Food was good and so was beer.  They take Visa and MasterCard.  We've discovered not all places in Amsterdam do.  Cozy atmosphere with some couches and small pub style tables.

Name: Crea Caf√©
Review Text: Student run café, always a great atmosphere, very busy! A reasonable selection of beers, and a good selection of simple, homey food for an excellent price.

Name: Crea Caf√©
Review Text: Several times their unprofessional staff kept us waiting while others were served  who came later to the bar. I won't go there anymore. It's really a disappointment.

Name: Crea Caf√©
Review Text: My favorite place at university. They have a  great vibe and amazing staff. Can only recommend. Thanks for being awesome guys 😁

Name: Crea Caf√©
Review Text: Lovely café, mostly visited by students, great environment, good prices and different spaces where to sit.

Name: Crea Caf√©
Review Text: Very nice place for students and non-students. Good and drink is cheap but the environment is very good.

Name: Crea Caf√©
Review Text: Good place with nice food at a reasonable price. Can get a bit crowded, but there's probably a good reason for that ..

Name: Crea Caf√©
Review Text: Been here for the NerdNite, but the bar is super cute even after. Good beers and a nice student vibe.

Name: Crea Caf√©
Review Text: Nice cozy place to enjoy a drink with some fellow uneversity students. Staff is nice and helpfull.

Name: Crea Caf√©
Review Text: Always managed to find a place to sit for groupwork. Prices are quite student-friendly, at 2-3 euros per hot drink.

Name: Crea Caf√©
Review Text: Friendly staff, cheap and with good food/drink options. Popular among students.

Name: Crea Caf√©
Review Text: Best place in Amsterdam for a drink, always a nice atmosphere, I especially appreciated the staff, amazing beautiful people !

Name: Crea Caf√©

Name: Crea Caf√©
Review Text: Staff is a little slow and the service is confusing. But the coffee is ok and the atmosphere is cozy.
